title: Mainframes 101: A Beginner's Guide to Getting Started
description: An introductory guide to mainframe concepts and terminology for absolute beginners.

title: Installing and Using C3270 on MacOS for IBM ZExplore Beginners
description: Step-by-step instructions for setting up and using the C3270 terminal emulator on MacOS.

title: Setting Up VSCode on MacOS for IBM ZExplore: Step-by-Step
description: A comprehensive guide to configuring Visual Studio Code for mainframe development on MacOS.

title: ISPF Made Simple: Your Guide to Mainframe Navigation
description: Learn how to navigate and use the Interactive System Productivity Facility (ISPF) on mainframes.

title: TSO Basics: How to Work with the Time Sharing Option
description: An introduction to TSO commands and concepts for mainframe interaction.

title: Investigating Errors with JCL: A Beginner's Troubleshooting Guide
description: Learn how to identify and resolve common Job Control Language (JCL) errors in mainframe environments.

title: Linux Fundamentals for Mainframe Beginners: Bridging the Gap
description: Understand how Linux concepts apply in a mainframe context and learn about Linux on Z.
